title: CoI-Based Distributed Learning Design to Overcome Educational Limitations in MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Online Learning Environments and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Experience in educational planning and operation within organizations as a manager, with interest in building social learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three presences (social, cognitive, teaching) of the CoI framework to MOOC environments.
Learners can operate role-divided and self-directed learning communities within small groups using distributed learning strategies.
Learners can perform project-based assessments in mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
